titles.title: Holocaust Victims' Assets, Restitution Policy, and Remembrance Act
To suspend temporarily the duty on nelfilcon polymer.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 5/16/2001--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend through December 31, 2004, the duty on nelfilcon polymer.
